meanings.definition: To comb or card wool or other fiber with a teasel.
meanings.sent1: She teaselled the wool to make it softer.
meanings.sent2: The artisan teaselled the fabric to give it a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The sheep tried to teasel its own wool but ended up in a tangle.
meanings.sent4: Her gentle hands teaselled through the fibers like a breeze through a field.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic motion of teaselling created a soothing sound in the room.

meanings.definition: Having a rough surface like that of a teasel.
meanings.sent1: The teaselled fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The teaselled edges of the blanket added a rustic touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The teaselled surface of the rock scratched his palm as he climbed.
meanings.sent4: Her teaselled hair stood out in wild tufts after a windy day.
meanings.sent5: The teaselled texture of the painting gave it a unique, tactile quality.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Dipsacus, having prickly heads of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The teaselled plant swayed in the breeze, its flowers shining in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She admired the teaselled blooms in the garden, their spikes gleaming.
meanings.sent3: The teaselled plant seemed to wave at her as she passed by.
meanings.sent4: The teaselled flower heads looked like tiny crowns in the field.
meanings.sent5: The teaselled plant added a touch of wild beauty to the landscape.
